Description:
Our client is a Real Estate Industry company. They are now looking for a VAT Accountant to join them.Roles & ResponsibilitiesPreparation, filing and payment of VAT returns
Accounting and reconciling month end trial balances, P&L and BS before review
Perform Revenue reconciliations and ensure that revenue is booked in accordance with the Company polices
Prepare, validate and submit of monthly/quarterly VAT return according to govt. regulations ensuring all related queries are proactively addressed
Annual reporting and VAT compliance. Skills
Skills:
Any certification in analytics would be added advantage
Immediate joiners
Minimum 5- 6 years of Experience in relevant field

Experience in Real Estate Industry
Hand on Experience of Oracle ERP
Computer proficiency in MS Office, advanced Excel skills
Bachelor's Degree in Accounts or a related field.
